programmes.show_description: Groomed For Murder. Luke Harlow imprisoned a schoolgirl in his flat before Stephen Beadman raped and murdered her. Experts reveal how they gave away their guilt within moments. S5, Ep2
When's Mom Coming Home? After her divorce Joann Albanese meets a new man. But by the time Joann discovers her boyfriend isn't who he claims to be, it's already too late. S7, Ep11
Tell Me You Love Me. Ashley Pittman thinks she met her perfect match when she marries Jeffrey Scott. But behind the closed doors of her new life, a secret threatens to turn deadly. S7, Ep12
The Three Of Us. A woman vanishes while on a Hawaiian vacation to celebrate her 29th birthday. Police trace her movements to a Waikiki hotel, covered by CCTV cameras. S7, Ep11
The Cookie Lady. An elderly woman is beaten to death in her Texas home. The only clues are a trail of strange credit card transactions - and surveillance video. S7, Ep12

Soldier Soldier. Forensic experts uncover the stories behind the deaths of the young men who went to war and never came back. S1, Ep1
Deadly Chemistry. Poisons can be deadly and are often impossible to detect. Forensic experts show how they can solve these mysterious deaths. S1, Ep2
Radical Resistance. The bureau investigates the activities of a Croatian terrorist group who gunned down some of their opponents and eliminated others with parcel bombs. S6, Ep16
Operation Goldenrod. In Beirut armed extremists seize a plane and terrorise everyone on board. The CIA undertakes a daring operation to stop the hijackers; but will they succeed? S6, Ep18
Ian Huntley. The murder of 10-year-olds Holly Wells and Jessica Chapman in 2002 shocked the UK. Experts study media interviews of their killer, Ian Huntley, to expose his lies. S2, Ep1
Caught in the Act. Follows FBI investigations into similar armed robberies across the US in which several people were killed by two male suspects. S5, Ep2
Home Invaders. A convicted bank robber and his partner in crime escape on their way to court and go on to make the biggest bank robbery in Wisconsin history. S5, Ep5
Lawless. When police officers respond to a domestic disturbance, a fleeing suspect fires at them. Fingerprints and an FBI investigation lead to the criminal. S5, Ep7
Operation Howze And Bolton Fraud. Barrister Robert Rinder explores the case of a gang who terrorised the elderly and vulnerable, stealing hundreds of thousands of pounds. S2, Ep1
Laura Davies And Acid Attack. Judge Rinder examines the case of 21-year-old Laura Davies, who was murdered by her partner when she wanted to end their relationship. S1, Ep1
Victor Nealon And Cash Robberies. Judge Rinder examines the wrongful conviction of Victor Nealon, who was found guilty of attempted rape and sentenced to life imprisonment. S1, Ep2
Joanna Yeates. British criminal barrister Robert Rinder examines the case of 25-year-old Joanna Yeates, who was found strangled to death on Christmas Day in 2010. S1, Ep3
320k Con And Zoe Dronfield. Judge Rinder examines the real-life case of Debbie Davey, who fell victim to an elaborate scam orchestrated by a very close friend. S1, Ep4
Adam Vincent And Sophie Lancaster. British criminal barrister Robert Rinder examines the case of Adam Vincent from Grimsby, who was severely menaced by a local family. S1, Ep5
Asher Maslin. Hollie Gazzard is murdered at work by her ex-partner, Asher Maslin. What critical mistake gave police what they needed to bring the killer to justice? S5, Ep8
Black Widow Of Pennsylvania. When Myrle's husband dies under mysterious circumstances, her daughter Rebecca suspects she's a black widow in disguise. S10, Ep12
The Speedboat Killer. After Charlotte Brown died in a speedboat accident, the vessel's owner claimed he was innocent. Experts reveal the full extent of Jack Shepherd's deception. S5, Ep3
Dance With Me. Ramon Sosa is a father of three who runs a successful boxing gym in Texas. He feels like the luckiest man alive until someone marks him for murder. S7, Ep13
An Uncomfortable Day. Property developer Robert Pann and trainee nurse Bernice Gray seem like the ideal match. But buried secrets are about to end this picture-perfect romance. S7, Ep14
Cruel Love. A 13-year-old boy comes home to find his stepmother murdered and his 15-year-old sister missing. Police race to piece together a killer's video trail. S7, Ep13
Silent Screams. A Minnesota woman vanishes from a mall after a date with her estranged husband. A shocking discovery in a parking lot leads police to CCTV footage. S7, Ep14

Signed in Blood. Explores how handwriting analysts now play an important role in profiling criminals and verifying the authenticity of suicide notes. S1, Ep13
Trial of the Century. The OJ Simpson murder trial captured the attention of the nation. Find out what forensics could and couldn't tell us about the trial of the century. S1, Ep15
Predator. When a little girl is abducted the FBI race to locate their prime suspect - a drifter on parole for kidnapping children - but will they find him before it's too late? S3, Ep6
Deadly Stranger. A seemingly charming and generous man targets vulnerable women for his brutal attacks, leading to a cross-country manhunt for the serial killer. S3, Ep12
13 Years A Slave And 45k Family Fraud. A vulnerable man goes missing but the truth behind his disappearance is even more sinister than could ever have been imagined. S2, Ep2
Death By Desire. Paige Birgfeld is the ultimate multi-tasker, balancing family and jobs. But beneath the fa√ßade, she is hiding a dark secret that will lead to the ultimate betrayal. S2, Ep10
The Long Drive Home. Jason Landry disappears in December 2020 while driving from campus at Texas State to Missouri City. His car is found wrecked on the side of a country road. S10, Ep1
Must Find Mickey. 21-year-old Mickey Shunick is missing after a night out. Police are unable to find any trace of the Louisiana student until they spot her on surveillance video. S2, Ep1
Joanne Dennehy: Serial Killer. Joanne Dennehy is serving a life prison sentence after murdering three men in Peterborough. Detectives share the intimate details of the investigation. S1, Ep1
Breathe For Me Mom. Cheri and Brian dote on their only child, Scott, and his kids. The close-knit family thrives until a shocking betrayal tears them apart. S9, Ep1

programmes.show_description: Hazard Lights. The abduction and murder of a young schoolteacher shocks a New England town. Veteran investigator Robert Cushing is appalled by the depravity of the killer's plan. S1, Ep1
Julie Archer And Operation Bloodstone. Judge Rinder explores the story of a woman who was set on fire and a series of thefts of laughing gas canisters from hospitals. S3, Ep1
The Green Carpet. When 71-year-old Cindy Mudd goes missing, the Kanawha County Sheriff's Office turns to CCTV to retrace her movements. S10, Ep18
Thailand: Murder At Sea. A couple's dream retirement in Thailand became a nightmare when pirates boarded their yacht. What followed was a terrifying hostage ordeal, and murder. S1, Ep3
William Cornick. A clever child from a loving home, William Cornick shocked Britain when he stabbed to death his teacher in 2014. What caused his pathological hatred? S1, Ep1
